name: gehir_game
description: prototype game for promoting interdisciplinary research of religions (see gehir.phil.muni.cz)

scripts.onchange-css: onchange src/css/*.css -- parallelshell "rimraf dist/app.css" "node concat src/css/*.css dist/app.css"
scripts.start: parallelshell "npm run devel" "npm run coffee-to-js" "npm run onchange-js"  "npm run onchange-vendor" "npm run onchange-html" "npm run onchange-css" "npm run move-to-dist" "npm run onchange-sprites" "npm run move-vendor" "npm run move-sprites" "npm run onchange-data" "npm run move-data" "npm run http-server"
